title: What do you think was the best product announced at I/O 2022? [Poll]
content:
A week ago at Google I/O 2022, we saw some interesting new launch announcements including a brand new wave of products — some of which we won’t see fully until later this fall.

more…

description: Google launched a whole host of new hardware products at I/O 2022, but we're asking you just what you think is the best introduction.
